user_query: I want to surprise my family with a special dinner and play some nice music. Can you recommend popular albums for a family gathering? Also, share a random Chuck Norris joke to make everyone laugh. Additionally, I want to exchange currency for buying groceries. Please give me the exchange rate from USD to the local currency and the available quotes for currency exchange.

TaskList.description: Recommend popular albums suitable for a family gathering.
Fetch a random Chuck Norris joke to entertain the family.
Get the current exchange rate from USD to the local currency.
Retrieve available quotes for currency exchange.
